rajawali.scenegraph

Class Octree

  • java.lang.Object
    • rajawali.bounds.BoundingBox
      • rajawali.scenegraph.A_nAABBTree
        • rajawali.scenegraph.Octree
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoundingVolume, IGraphNode

    public class Octree
extends A_nAABBTree
    Octree implementation specific to the Rajawali library. Child partitions will inherit the behavior (recursive add, division threshold, etc.) of the root node in the graph. This system divides space into 8 equal portions called octants. The octant order follows the conventional algebraic numbering for 3D Euclidean space. Note that they follow the axis ordering and OpenGL uses a rotated coordinate system when compared to Euclidean mathematics. Thus, assuming no camera rotation or similar effects:
    Author:
    Jared Woolston (jwoolston@tenkiv.com)
    See Also:
    http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Octant_(solid_geometry) 
     
     Octant     | Screen Region
 ---------------|---------------
       0        | +X/+Y/+Z
       1        | -X/+Y/+Z 
       2        | -X/-Y/+Z
       3        | +X/-Y/+Z
       4        | +X/+Y/-Z
       5        | -X/+Y/-Z
       6        | -X/-Y/-Z
       7        | +X/-Y/-Z

    • Constructor Detail

      • Octree

        public Octree()
        Default constructor. Initializes the root node with default merge/division behavior.

      • Octree

        public Octree(int mergeThreshold,
      int splitThreshold,
      int shrinkThreshold,
      int growThreshold,
      int overlap)
        Constructor to setup root node with specified merge/split and grow/shrink behavior.
        Parameters:
        maxMembers - int containing the divide threshold count. When more members than this are added, a partition will divide into 8 children.
        minMembers - int containing the merge threshold count. When fewer members than this exist, a partition will recursively merge to its ancestors.
        overlap - int containing the percentage overlap between two adjacent partitions. This allows objects to be nested deeper in the tree when they would ordinarily span a boundry.

      • Octree

        public Octree(Octree parent,
      int mergeThreshold,
      int splitThreshold,
      int shrinkThreshold,
      int growThreshold,
      int overlap)
        Constructor to setup a child node with specified merge/split and grow/shrink behavior.
        Parameters:
        parent - Octree which is the parent of this partition.
        maxMembers - int containing the divide threshold count. When more members than this are added, a partition will divide into 8 children.
        minMembers - int containing the merge threshold count. When fewer members than this exist, a partition will recursively merge to its ancestors.
        overlap - int containing the percentage overlap between two adjacent partitions. This allows objects to be nested deeper in the tree when they would ordinarily span a boundry.
